name: Prashant Nandede
about: A Food Technogist with expertise in Food Formulations and ingredient applications.

experience.title: Scientist
experience.description: •	Identify value innovations ideas and do the cost benefit analysis on gross margin improvement for product formulations by liaising with Finance, R&D Head, Supply chain, Procurement etc.•	Work closely with procurement team for all alternate vendor development projects to de risk the supply strategy as well costing savings projects•	Lead VI Projects by continuously conducting the weekly/fortnightly meetings for cross functional team members to meet the project timelines.•	R&D super user for SAP PLM for formulations and ING Specifications (Raw Material specifications)•	Support supply chain team for setting new 2P factories from R&D •	Track the value innovations (VI) budget for projects spends like Testing charges, trial spends, raw materials and report to R&D head•	Partner with Scientific and medical affairs team to assess the claims from product development part of Value innovations (VI) projects.•	Conduct the R&D workshops for identification of cost savings ideas and build the future pipeline with larger R&D Fuel for growth agenda•	Partner with regulatory team to understand the artwork and ingredients listing in all
experience.description_html: • Identify value innovations ideas and do the cost benefit analysis on gross margin improvement for product formulations by liaising with Finance, R&D Head, Supply chain, Procurement etc.• Work closely with procurement team for all alternate vendor development projects to de risk the supply strategy as well costing savings projects• Lead VI Projects by continuously conducting the weekly/fortnightly meetings for cross functional team members to meet the project timelines.• R&D super user for SAP PLM for formulations and ING Specifications (Raw Material specifications)• Support supply chain team for setting new 2P factories from R&D • Track the value innovations (VI) budget for projects spends like Testing charges, trial spends, raw materials and report to R&D head• Partner with Scientific and medical affairs team to assess the claims from product development part of Value innovations (VI) projects.• Conduct the R&D workshops for identification of cost savings ideas and build the future pipeline with larger R&D Fuel for growth agenda• Partner with regulatory team to understand the artwork and ingredients listing in all

positions.subtitle: GSK Consumer Healthcare India
positions.description: •	Identify and drive the value engineering projects on Gross Margin Improvement projects to deliver targeted business savings.•	Develop formulations based on the Business requirements, consumer insights & regulatory Compliance.•	Responsible for complete execution of GeoEx Value Engineering Projects i.e. for international markets (ISC markets)•	Strong technical knowledge and understanding of HFD manufacturing processes.•	Develop Raw material specification, finished product specification, Manufacturing guidelines, Trial protocols, Stability protocols, Technology transfer protocol.•	Responsible for providing active support to procurement team for developing alternate vendor for raw materials to de-risking the sourcing strategy in the system.•	Carry out initial product costing to evaluate project viability.•	Liase with various functions within R&D like Analytical, Regulatory, Nutrition, Sensory and Packaging to enable the progress on the assigned projects.•	Works closely with supply chain and marketing /brand team for smooth project implementation
positions.title: Product Optimization Scientist
positions.description_html:
• Identify and drive the value engineering projects on Gross Margin Improvement projects to deliver targeted business savings.
• Develop formulations based on the Business requirements, consumer insights & regulatory Compliance.
• Responsible for complete execution of GeoEx Value Engineering Projects i.e. for international markets (ISC markets)
• Strong technical knowledge and understanding of HFD manufacturing processes.
• Develop Raw material specification, finished product specification, Manufacturing guidelines, Trial protocols, Stability protocols, Technology transfer protocol.
• Responsible for providing active support to procurement team for developing alternate vendor for raw materials to de-risking the sourcing strategy in the system.
• Carry out initial product costing to evaluate project viability.
• Liase with various functions within R&D like Analytical, Regulatory, Nutrition, Sensory and Packaging to enable the progress on the assigned projects.
• Works closely with supply chain and marketing /brand team for smooth project implementation

positions.subtitle: GSK Consumer Healthcare India
positions.description: - Assisting and supporting the various new product development and technical project by citation of literature on various new technology.- Prepare the formulation for various technical and NPD project and carry out the Lab scale and Pilot scale trial.-Conduct stability studies , generate stability data and stability certificate or shelf life certificate for various NPD and Technical project.-Assist and support in the generating all the documentaion related to new product development and technical project.- Keeping the records of Stability data.-Prepration of samples in lab scale and carry out the sensory testing with NPD and technical team.- identify the issues and solve problems with the value engineering projects.- Support in the identification of alternate vendor for the various different raw materials for the value engineerin projects.- Well Familiar with BPCS /AS 400 software used for making BOM,MRP,API.
positions.title: Project Associate
positions.description_html:
- Assisting and supporting the various new product development and technical project by citation of literature on various new technology.
- Prepare the formulation for various technical and NPD project and carry out the Lab scale and Pilot scale trial.
-Conduct stability studies , generate stability data and stability certificate or shelf life certificate for various NPD and Technical project.
-Assist and support in the generating all the documentaion related to new product development and technical project.
- Keeping the records of Stability data.
-Prepration of samples in lab scale and carry out the sensory testing with NPD and technical team.
- identify the issues and solve problems with the value engineering projects.
- Support in the identification of alternate vendor for the various different raw materials for the value engineerin projects.
- Well Familiar with BPCS /AS 400 software used for making BOM,MRP,API.

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: - Carry out the online analysis of all the quality parameters such as pH, Acidity, Total soluble solids,consistency,viscosity etc.-Online quality inspection of the various fruit and vegetable products,RTE,RTC products.-Prepare all documents of various quality audits and maintain records of data as per good documentation practices.

recommendations: Sumana Dutta Choudhury “Prashant is highly energetic and sincere professional. He has exemplary can do attitude to crack business solutions with precision.I worked with him closely during my GSK and HUL tenure.He was instrumental in building value engineering pipeline for nutrition and has great track record on yoy cost savings delivery.He is committed person and can be a good asset of any organization. All the best to Prashant for your future endeavors. ”
Vaibhav Pedgaonkar “Prashant is a humble, hardworking and dedicated scientist. I recommend him highly for projects that need deep rigor and patience ”
